hv_comment.body: @klu9@zeroid.bit sorry, missed your comment earlier (ha-ha, i should really implement subscribing to comments, shouldn't be that hard anyway). Just watching original Potyomkin wouldn't help (re_potemkin's plot is "the same", but scenes from it without context certainly lose it), but watching https://re-potemkin.httpdot.net/ certainly can (in fact, i got so familiar with it while editing that it becomes hard to imagine how it looks without context). It's not necessary (or so i hope), but i suppose if you don't get bored watching it, you can appreciate the humor and "plot details" here better
